Best Practice: Windows Script Host is disabled
Backup services run under the LocalSystem account
Outdated SSL And TLS are Disabled
Unknown Linux servers are not trusted automatically
SMB v3 signing is enabled

Immutable or offline media is used

Computer is Workgroup member
Reverse incremental backup mode is not used

SMB 1.0 is disabled
Email notifications are enabled

Credentials and encryption passwords rotates annually
Remote powershell is disabled (WinRM service)

Linux servers have password-based authentication disabled

Configuration backup is enabled
Windows firewall is enabled
Configuration backup is enabled and use encryption

The configuration backup is not stored on the backup server
